scripts.lint: npm run lint:script && npm run lint:style && npm run lint:ls
scripts.build:app-plus: cross-env NODE_ENV=production UNI_PLATFORM=app-plus UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/app-plus vue-cli-service uni-build
scripts.build:h5: cross-env NODE_ENV=production UNI_PLATFORM=h5 UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/h5 vue-cli-service uni-build
scripts.build:mp-360: cross-env NODE_ENV=production UNI_PLATFORM=mp-360 UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/mp-360 vue-cli-service uni-build
scripts.build:mp-alipay: cross-env NODE_ENV=production UNI_PLATFORM=mp-alipay UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/mp-alipay vue-cli-service uni-build
scripts.build:mp-baidu: cross-env NODE_ENV=production UNI_PLATFORM=mp-baidu UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/mp-baidu vue-cli-service uni-build
scripts.build:mp-qq: cross-env NODE_ENV=production UNI_PLATFORM=mp-qq UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/mp-qq vue-cli-service uni-build
scripts.build:mp-toutiao: cross-env NODE_ENV=production UNI_PLATFORM=mp-toutiao UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/mp-toutiao vue-cli-service uni-build
scripts.build:mp-weixin: cross-env NODE_ENV=production UNI_PLATFORM=mp-weixin UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/mp-weixin vue-cli-service uni-build
scripts.build:quickapp-native: cross-env NODE_ENV=production UNI_PLATFORM=quickapp-native UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/quickapp-native vue-cli-service uni-build
scripts.build:quickapp-webview: cross-env NODE_ENV=production UNI_PLATFORM=quickapp-webview UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/quickapp-webview vue-cli-service uni-build
scripts.dev:app-plus: cross-env NODE_ENV=development UNI_PLATFORM=app-plus UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/app-plus vue-cli-service uni-build --watch
scripts.dev:h5: cross-env NODE_ENV=development UNI_PLATFORM=h5 UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/h5 vue-cli-service uni-serve
scripts.dev:mp-360: cross-env NODE_ENV=development UNI_PLATFORM=mp-360 UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/mp-360 vue-cli-service uni-build --watch
scripts.dev:mp-alipay: cross-env NODE_ENV=development UNI_PLATFORM=mp-alipay UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/mp-alipay vue-cli-service uni-build --watch

scripts.dev:mp-toutiao: cross-env NODE_ENV=development UNI_PLATFORM=mp-toutiao UNI_OUTPUT_DIR=dist/mp-toutiao vue-cli-service uni-build --watch
